story.name: &os; 8 Getting New Routing Architecture

story.name: Why &os; 8 Won't Rewrite the Book
story.author: Sean Michael Kerner
story.p: An article about the upcoming &os; 8.0 release, which includes interviews with Michael Lucas, author of the Absolute &os; book, Matt Olander of iXsystems, and Kris Moore of PC-BSD. The primary focus of the article is how &os;, even across major releases, still keeps the disruption for users to a minimum, and introduces new features and improvements without forcing a paradigm shift on the users.
